DOC.brief_title: Fish Oil Supplementation Vascular Function Hypertensive Patients With Hypertriglyceridemia
DOC.detailed_description: Hypertensive patient age 40-65 year , gender , present serum triglyceride level higher 150 mg/dl randomize two group . The first group receive ciprofibrate 100mg/day second group receive fish oil 1800mg/day . All patient evaluate brachial flow-mediated dilation EndoPAT ass endothelial function supplementation . SPHYGMOCOR pulse wave velocity ( PWV ) measurement also obtain .
